name: Blood Hawk
description: The Blood Hawk is a small, agile bird known for its keen eyesight and effective aerial attacks.
memorable: Its Heightened Sight ability allows it to have an exceptional Perception score when using sight.
goals: Typically, it serves as a scout or aerial attacker, hunting prey from the skies.
relations: Often found in groups, aiding allies with its Pack Tactics ability.
environment: Can be encountered in various environments, usually in areas where it can fly and scout for threats.
strengths: Exceptional agility with a flying speed of 60 feet and a strategic advantage when fighting alongside allies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable due to low armor class and hit points, requiring careful positioning in combat.
attacks: Utilizes a beak attack that can inflict piercing damage with a high chance of success due to its attack bonus.
most_powerful_ability: Heightened Sight, allowing a Perception score of 19 when using sight.
senses: Has a high Perception score of 14, making it effective at spotting hidden threats.
skills: Possesses a Stealth score of 12, allowing it to move quietly and avoid detection.
additional_information: Can use Evasive Flight as a bonus action to disengage or dodge while flying.
Benefits from the Pack Tactics ability to gain advantage on attack rolls.
Weak physical strength with a Strength score of -2, making it ineffective in melee confrontations.
Good Dexterity provides it with enhanced accuracy and evasion capabilities.
Not capable of complex thought with an Intelligence score of -4.

bird that works well in packs and hunts
